typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ItemName as string,
		ItemSkew as string,
		DatePurchase as timestamp,
		DateReturned as timestamp,
		cost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select\nItemName, ItemSkew, DatePurchase, DateReturned, cost\nfrom\n [dbo].[srcTableA]',
	format: 'query') ~> srcTableA
srcTableA alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> upsert
upsert sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		ItemName as string,
		ItemSkew as string,
		DatePurchase as timestamp,
		DateReturned as timestamp,
		cost as decimal(19,4),
		DateLoaded as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ItemSkew'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ItemName,
		ItemSkew,
		DatePurchase,
		DateReturned,
		cost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtTableB
